Hinweis: Der Besuch der Berufsschule bra: Note: You need not prove your attendance at a vocational school, if you have an apprenticeship contract with a company (Ausbildung).
Name und Vorname des/der Kindergeldberec: Last name and first name of the person entitled to child benefit
Schulbescheinigung zur Vorlage bei der F: Certificate of school attendance for submission to the Family Payments Office
part-time class of ... hours per week
Telefonische Rückfrage tagsüber unter Nr: Daytime phone number in case of questions:
completed the school education in month / year ...
und wird die Schulausbildung - voraussic: and is expected to complete the school education in month / year ...
